alert.note: Alert for Adair; Mercer; Putnam; Schuyler; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 9:12PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Adair, northern Sullivan, Mercer, Putnam, northeastern Harrison and Schuyler Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 911 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms just north of the Missouri and Iowa border. A wind gust front well ahead of the line of storms along a line extending from near Eddyville to 8 miles southeast of Chariton to near Sun Valley Lake is creating 35 to 45 mph wind. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bethany, Unionville, Lancaster, Princeton, Queen City, Ridgeway, Greentop, Downing, Mercer, Eagleville, Cainsville, Lineville, Glenwood, Blythedale, Newtown, Pollock, Mount Moriah, Lucerne, Worthington and Livonia. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 93 and 112. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
